channel.title: Help with portforwarding ill give owner and runescape acc lvl 99
channel.description:
i have a motorola router vt2442 and i cant get the port forwarding to work so if any one knows how to port forward.with motorola i will give owner on my server =)and a runescape acc lvl 96 name is alpha pilot here are some pics.
[IMG]http://i33.tinypic.com/2ntzq8h.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i35.tinypic.com/30kw10o.jpg[/img]
and i did use utorrent and it doesnt work any ideas please tell me!!!

item.title: Help with portforwarding ill give owner and runescape acc lvl 99
item.dc:creator: @justa_lol justa lol
item.description:
@justa_lol wrote:

just go on start -> control panel -> windows firewall -> add port -> fill out -> your done

i dont need those crappy things you offer and gtfo if you want to keep on offering

item.title: Help with portforwarding ill give owner and runescape acc lvl 99
item.dc:creator: @MistaBigBoss MistaBigBoss
item.description:
@MistaBigBoss wrote:

Its simple i know a way to run server whitout portforwarding. Step1: download utorrent(google it). Step2: klik options. Step3: klik preferences. Step4: klik connections. Step5: check “unable upnp port mapping”, “enable nat -pmp port mapping” and “add utorrent to windows firewall”. Step6: change the ramdon port to 43594 and save it. Now you can run your’e server whitout portforwarding. ATTENTION: ALWAYS RUN UTORRENT FIRST BEFORE YOU RUN THE SERVER OTHERWHISE IT WONT WORK.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with portforwarding ill give owner and runescape acc lvl 99
item.dc:creator: @darklink643 darklink643
item.description:
@darklink643 wrote:

[quote=“Retard Monkey, post:2, topic:232360”]You really shouldn’t have to offer that kind of stuff here, because somebody will accept. To be honest, change the title FAST so that it no longer mentions the 99 account, or you will be spammed with mails like:
‘Ai hljped gimy 99 akont plux oer ai shtab u’
(In English, that roughly translates as:
I helped give me the 99 account pwned-ten-times or I will stab you).

You don’t have to pay me any attention, and you can give it away if you like, just saying.
Sorry, I never had to portforward so I don’t know anything about it.

~Retard Monkey[/quote]thanks but i think im gunna take my chances :S

Read full topic
